Warhead was getting impatient. The least Gun Man could have done was 
to give a sign of life...

Warhead: Rage, Trashcan, you both go and fetch that sleepy head! His 
room is in wing 3. Tell him I'm mad.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: You mean my guy?
> 
> BIC: Gun Man hears the call from his Warhead. (Hey, all the good 
names have been taken)
> 
> Gun Man: I don't remember them calling me before.
> 
> He starts walking slowly towards the location he was called to. He 
was taking his time, not figuring that the Quasacons would mind his 
tardiness...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: warriorazure 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Sunday, February 17, 2002 9:02 AM
>   Subject: Quasacons & Sadisticons/attn Narrator
> 
> 
>   The transmission arrives to the space station about 12 hours after 
it 
>   was sent. Its message booms in all of it so loud that every 
sleeping 
>   bot will be awakened. As Warhead hears it, he is filled with joy. 
>   Combat! After a year of drilling his team, they will finally get 
>   combat!
> 
>   Warhead: HEAR THAT QUASACONS! WE WILL HAVE OUR TIME FOR BATTLE! WE 
>   SHALL FIGHT AND SLAUGHTER! Soon, we will depart for Earth and join 
the 
>   Sadisticons. (He moves to the console near him) As soon as this 
>   slacker gets here... (He activates the speakers) WILL THE LAST 
>   QUASACON, AND I MEAN YOU, GET UP TO THE BRIDGE RIGHT AWAY?!?! 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
>   > UltraByte starts his speech, "As you all know now, we are 
heading 
>   for 
>   > Earth, when we land we will attack.  We do not know what 
factions 
>   > yet.  But we will and I mean Will attack."
>   > 
>   >    As UltraByte says these words the finally enter Earths 
>   > Atmosphere.  Lobstruck, Lady Right, Lepord, Kan Kick, and Snake 
Eyes 
>   > all listen attenitivly.  Lepord was getting a little impatiant.
>   > 
>   >    'I thought this speech would be all exciting and a box of 
>   > Cybertron Gravy.'  Lepord thought.
>   > 
>   >    "We will land then blow up the engine."  UltraByte says.
>   > 
>   >    With those words Lobstruck and Lady Right look up quickly in 
>   > surprise.  "What!"
>   > 
>   >    "I know you are all thinking I must be crazy but I know all 
of 
>   you 
>   > can defeat these bots.  We do not need to use the ship to blast 
>   them, 
>   > we can do it ourselves."  UltraByte says as he slams his fist 
down 
>   on 
>   > his chair.  That reminded UltraByte of the smudge earlier.  "By 
the 
>   > way, Lady Right, next time you clean my chair don't miss a 
spot." 
>   > 
>   > 
>   > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
>   > > Lepord, Lobstruck, and Lady Right all enter the 
bridge(Hopefully 
>   > > followed by Void).  "Okay UltraByte the Intruder is taken care 
>   > of."  
>   > > Lobstruck says as he walks over to infront of the Big Chair of 
the 
>   > > bridge.  Lepord and Lady Right start to have a side 
conversation.
>   > > 
>   > > "I fought good,"  said Lepord to Lady Right quiet enough that 
you 
>   > > could only hear it if you walk by.
>   > > 
>   > > "Yeah, I am happy for you."  Lady Right says back.
>   > > 
>   > > OOC:  Umm I cant remember if any of the people joining my 
faction 
>   > > have characters on the ship or are join later but I shall give 
>   them 
>   > > time to respond and if they have to tell me something do so 
over 
>   > > private mail.     
>   > > 
>   > > 
>   > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
>   > > > Void nods silently before heading to the bridge.
>
